===Abrahamic religions=== (Old Testament)

===Abrahamic religions (Old Testament)===
  +  
In the [[Christianity|Christian]] [[Bible]] and [[Judaism|Jewish]] scripture, Wisdom is also represented by the sense of justice of the lawful and wise king [[Solomon]], who asks God for wisdom in [[1 Kings]] 3. [[Book of Proverbs|Proverbs]] 9:10 says: "The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom," (Proverbs 1:7) and 8:13 "To fear the Lord is to hate evil;".
